about_the_game:
Slaughter Cats is a bloody side scrolling beat'em up platformer fusing intense combat and fun platforming in a vivid and varied world. Players can play by themselves or play locally or online with up to four people in 3 different modes: Arcade, Horde and Deathmatch. Battle across stunning landscapes utilizing a complex combat system and magical abilities to help you shower in the blood of diverse challenging enemies from angry viking and orc raiders to slippery ninjas and nefarious necromancers. Slaughter Cats takes inspiration from classic beat'em ups such as Golden Axe and Castle Crashers and combines that with influences from platforming greats such as Crash Bandicoot and Mario to come up with a unique fusion of the genres with a little extra splash of blood.


KEY FEATURES
  • Single and Multiplayer: Play solo, locally or online with up to four people in co-op and PVP.
  • Arcade Mode: Massacre your way through the main story across stunning landscapes laying waste to the enemies and bosses that stand in your way.
  • Deathmatch Mode: Battle other players in free-for-all PVP!
  • Horde Mode: Test your might against an endless barrage of enemies to see what you're really made of.
  • Unlockables: Unlock more than 10 characters and over 40 deadly weapons!
  • Intuitive Combo and Magic System: Unlock an arsenal of new savage attacks and abilities as you progress through the game.
  • Slaughter Mode: Launch into a blood fuelled rage leaving nothing but death and destruction in your wake.
  • Level Up: Improve your cat and adjust Strength, Magic, Defense, and Agility.
  • Beyond Insanity Mode: Test your skills in the ultimate campaign challenge.



[1 - 4 Local Players Co-op] - [1 - 4 Online Players Co-op]

Avenge the death of your grandpa and take back what was stolen from you by the evil Jelly Dog. Fight your way through over 20 levels of diverse detailed landscapes and level up your chosen cat as you progress through the game by adjusting their skill points. Unlock devastating new moves, combos, magical abilities and over 40 lethal weapons to become even more deadly and slaughter your enemies mercilessly.



[1 - 4 Local Players Co-op] - [1 - 4 Online Players Co-op]

Try your best to butcher the endless waves of enemies who are out to make you bleed, in your quest to be top of the leader boards and become the Slaughter King. Play on your own or co-op locally or online and devastate your adversaries.



[2 - 4 Local Players PVP] - [2 - 4 Online Players PVP]

Compete in a bloody free for all against your friends locally or online or fight against random players in the ether, play in a wide variety of areas and customize the extensive game mode settings to your liking and try to slaughter the competition.

content_descriptors.notes: Sword/weapon fights resulting in blood and dismemberment, also occasional drug use

  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8400 | AMD Phenom II X4 965
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTS 250 | AMD Radeon HD 6670
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Slaughter Cats is a brutal 1 - 4 player 3D side scrolling beat'em up platformer combining the chaotic fun of beat'em ups and the skillful precision of classic platformers. Slaughter your enemies in single player, local or online co-op or PVP with up to 4 players in Arcade, Deathmatch or Horde.
